item.title: Omid add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "We are all atheists about most of the gods that humanity has ever believed in. Some of us just go one god further." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Omid add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "I am against religion because it teaches us to be satisfied with not understanding the world." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Omid add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "There is no such thing as a Christian child: only a child of Christian parents." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Omid add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "There's real poetry in the real world. Science is the poetry of reality" -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Omid add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "The world and the universe is an extremely beautiful place, and the more we understand about it the more beautiful does it appear." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Omid add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "The problem with the world is that the intelligent people are full of doubts, while the stupid ones are full of confidence." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Omid add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I don't hate people. I just feel better when they aren't around." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Omid add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Sometimes you just have to pee in the sink." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Omid add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Omid add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "You cannot find peace by avoiding life." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Omid add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Omid add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Omid add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Omid add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "To you, I'm an atheist. To God, I'm the loyal opposition." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Omid add a quote by Hamide
item.description: "Life's nothing but the decisions you make every single day of your life." -- Hamide

item.title: Omid add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Omid add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Omid add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "being alone never felt right. sometimes it felt good, but it never felt right." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Omid add a quote by محمود دولت آبادی / Mahmoud Dolat Abadi
item.description: "عجیب ترین خوی آدمی این است که می داند فعلی بد و آسیب رسان است، اما آن را انجام می دهد به کرات هم. هر آدمی، دانسته و ندانسته، به نوعی در لجاجت و تعارض با خود به سر می برد، و هیچ دیگری ویرانگرتر از خود آدمی نسبت به خودش نیست." -- محمود دولت آبادی / Mahmoud Dolat Abadi

item.title: Omid add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Omid add a quote by Wilkie Collins
item.description: "The books - the generous friends who met me without suspicion - the merciful masters who never used me ill!" -- Wilkie Collins

item.title: Omid add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Omid add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Omid add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Omid add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description:
"Do you hate people?
I don't hate them...I just feel better when they're not around." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Omid add a quote by Oriana Fallaci
item.description: "عادت بدترین بیماریه. کاری می کنه که آدم به هر بدبختی و هر دردی سر خم کنه و بتونه کنار آدمای نفرت انگیز دووم بیاره" -- Oriana Fallaci

item.title: Omid add a quote by Charlie "Tremendous" Jones
item.description: "You're the same today as you'll be in five years except for the people you meet and the books you read." -- Charlie "Tremendous" Jones

item.title: Omid add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Omid add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Omid add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him." -- Maya Angelou
